source:
// ------------------- TRANSFORMATION POPULATION -----------------

// LECTURE FICHIER PARQUET 
val population = spark.read.parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/population")

// SUPPRESSION COLONNES + FILTRE PAYS ETUDIES
val population_supp_colonnes = population.drop("SEX")
val population_filtre_pays = population_supp_colonnes.filter(population_supp_colonnes("LOCATION").isin(listepays:_*))

val population_less_15 = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "LESS_15_SHARE")
val population_less_15_clean = population_less_15.withColumnRenamed("value","LESS_15_SHARE").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")


// CREATION DE 3 TABLES POUR CHAQUE VALEURS DE AGE + CHANGEMENT NOM COLONNES
val population_15_64 = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "15-64_SHARE")
val population_15_64_clean = population_15_64.withColumnRenamed("value","15-64_SHARE").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

val population_65_plus = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "65_OVER_SHARE")
val population_65_plus_clean = population_65_plus.withColumnRenamed("value","65_OVER_SHARE").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

val population_totale = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "TOTAL")
val population_totale_clean = population_totale.withColumnRenamed("value","Nombre_habitants").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

// JOINTURES
val population_less_64 = population_less_15_clean.join(population_15_64_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner")
val population_full = population_less_64.join(population_65_plus_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner")
val population_clean = population_full.join(population_totale_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner")

// ENREGISTREMENT .PARQUET => ARGENT
population_clean.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/argent/population")

// Transformation depensesociale
val depensesociale = spark.read.parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/depensessociales")

// SUPPRESSION COLONNES + FILTRE PAYS ETUDIES
val depensesociale_supp_colonnes = depensesociale.drop("SOURCE","BRANCH","TYPEXP","TYPROG","UNIT")

val depensesociale_filtre_pays = depensesociale_supp_colonnes
    .filter(depensesociale_supp_colonnes("COUNTRY")
    .isin(listepays:_*))

val depensesociale_clean = depensesociale_filtre_pays
    .withColumnRenamed("value","DEPENSES_SOCIALES (% PIB)")
    .withColumnRenamed("COUNTRY","LOCATION")
    .orderBy("COUNTRY","TIME_PERIOD")

// ENREGISTREMENT .PARQUET => ARGENT
depensesociale_clean.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/argent/depensessociales")
